item.title: DSV 与 Neom 的 100 亿美元并购案因未获批准而推迟
item.description: 丹麦货运公司 DSV A/S 与沙特阿拉伯沙漠项目 Neom 之间价值 100 亿美元的合资企业因缺少监管审批而被推迟。【原文：The $10 billion joint venture between Denmark’s freight company DSV A/S and Saudi Arabia’s desert project Neom has been delayed due to missing regulatory approvals.】

item.title: 加拿大新屋开工创七个月来最高水平
item.description: 由于加拿大最大的两个省份加大了公寓、联排别墅和共有公寓的建设力度，加拿大的住房开工率跃升至七个月以来的最高水平。【原文：Canada’s housing starts jumped to the highest level in seven months, as the country’s two largest provinces ramped up construction on apartments, townhouses and condominiums.】

item.title: 美银美林的米德为 2024 年蓝筹债券狂潮放缓做好准备
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp. ）的丹-米德（Dan Mead）预计，美国蓝筹股债券市场的活动将在今年年底前放缓，此前借款人在上半年大举举债，因为他们现在受到诱人收益率的诱惑，而以后则要避免大选波动。【原文：Bank of America Corp.’s Dan Mead expects US blue-chip bond market activity to slow down through the end of this year, after borrowers gorged on debt in the first half, enticed by attractive yields now and avoiding election volatility later.】

item.title: 纳图吉公司主要股东探讨所有权替代方案
item.description: 据投资者 Criteria Caixa SA 的官员称，在与阿布扎比国家能源公司（Abu Dhabi National Energy Co.【原文：Naturgy Energy Group SA’s biggest shareholder will explore new alternatives for ownership of the Spanish utility after talks with Abu Dhabi National Energy Co. to acquire the company collapsed, according to officials at investor Criteria Caixa SA.】

item.title: 欧洲央行副行长表示 "个人 "对极右翼势力抬头感到担忧
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，他对极右翼势力在整个地区的崛起感到担忧。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos said he’s concerned about the rise of the far-right across the region.】

item.title: 达赖喇嘛说他尚未考虑转世问题
item.description: 达赖喇嘛周一表示，他还没有考虑自己的转世问题，这为谁将接替这位八旬高僧增添了更多不确定性，因为中国正在推动对西藏未来及其领导权的控制。【原文：The Dalai Lama isn’t thinking about his reincarnation yet, he said on Monday, adding more uncertainty over who will succeed the octogenarian monk as China pushes for sway over the future of Tibet and its leadership.】

item.title: 爱尔兰银行出售与杠杆债务组合相关的 SRT
item.description: 据知情人士透露，爱尔兰银行集团（Bank of Ireland Group Plc）出售了一项与约 15 亿欧元（16 亿美元）杠杆融资池相关的重大风险转移。【原文：Bank of Ireland Group Plc sold a significant risk transfer tied to a pool of about €1.5 billion ($1.6 billion) in leveraged financing, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 莫迪获胜推动印度股市上涨，股票价值突破 5 万亿美元
item.description: 印度的股票市值首次超过 5 万亿美元，最新的推动力来自印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪的新联盟对世界上增长最快的主要经济体政策连续性的承诺。【原文：India’s stock market value is exceeding $5 trillion for the first time, with the latest boost coming from a commitment by Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s new coalition for policy continuity in the world’s fastest growing major economy.】

item.title: 零售基金在大赚 480 亿美元后潜心研究量化因子 ETF
item.description: 交易员们在以量化为动力的股票交易上斥资数十亿美元，推动了这种投资风格的发展，而在传统大盘股指数上的简单押注已获得丰厚回报的时代，这种投资风格却一直难以获得青睐。【原文：Traders are lavishing billions of dollars on quant-powered stock trades, boosting an investing style that’s struggled to gain traction in an era when simple bets on traditional large-cap indexes have paid off handsomely.】

item.title: 先锋集团称美联储的谨慎态度将阻碍加拿大降息
item.description: Vanguard Group 经济学家 Roger Aliaga-Diaz 表示，在政策制定者确信美联储已经准备好开始降低借贷成本之前，加拿大央行可能会对大幅降息犹豫不决。【原文：The Bank of Canada may hesitate to make aggressive rate cuts until policymakers feel assured the Federal Reserve is ready to start lowering borrowing costs, Vanguard Group economist Roger Aliaga-Diaz said.】

item.title: 俄罗斯大亨乌斯马诺夫就洗钱报告起诉瑞银集团
item.description: 被制裁的俄罗斯亿万富翁阿利舍尔-乌斯马诺夫（Alisher Usmanov）起诉了瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）在德国的一家分公司，称其反洗钱报告引发了针对他的非法刑事调查。【原文：Sanctioned Russian billionaire Alisher Usmanov sued a German unit of UBS Group AG over anti-money laundering reports that he claims triggered an illegal criminal investigation against him.】

item.title: 顶级船旗国削减对受制裁俄罗斯保险公司的批准
item.description: 世界最大的航运注册机构撤销了对俄罗斯 Ingosstrakh 保险公司提供船舶入港关键文件的批准。【原文：The world’s largest shipping register withdrew its approval for Russia’s Ingosstrakh Insurance Co. to provide a key document enabling ships to enter ports.】

item.title: 德国最大工会推动将工资提高 7
item.description: 德国最大的工会正在寻求将金属和电气零件行业约 390 万工人的工资提高 7%，以弥补过去几年消费者价格的大幅上涨。【原文：Germany’s largest labor union is seeking a wage increase of 7% for about 3.9 million workers in the metal and electric parts industries to make up for steep consumer-price gains over past years.】

item.title: 巴西中央银行在利率和通胀预测方面面临自找的危机
item.description: 巴西央行正面临着一场自己制造的紧急情况，有可能破坏多年来的巧妙决策和信誉提升。【原文：Brazil’s central bank is facing an emergency of its own making that threatens to sabotage years of deft policy making and credibility gains.】

item.title: 落后于 97% 的债券基金，Western 旗舰基金正在损失现金
item.description: 在被通胀和利率飙升灼伤两年后，美国许多顶级债券基金已开始慢慢扭转颓势。【原文：Two years after getting burned by a surge in inflation and interest rates, many of the top bond funds in the US have slowly started to turn things around.】

item.title: 彭伯顿为中型市场债务基金募集超过 40 亿欧元资金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，彭伯顿资产管理公司（Pemberton Asset Management）计划为其第四期中型市场债务策略融资超过 40 亿欧元（43 亿美元）。【原文：Pemberton Asset Management plans to raise more than €4 billion ($4.3 billion) for the fourth vintage of its mid-market debt strategy, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 克鲁夫非洲公司同意开发津巴布韦锂矿
item.description: 克鲁夫非洲有限公司（Cluff Africa Ltd.）与津巴布韦主权财富基金签署了一项不具约束力的协议，将在这个南部非洲国家开发锂矿。【原文：Cluff Africa Ltd. signed a non-binding agreement with Zimbabwe’s sovereign wealth fund to develop a lithium mine in the southern African country.】

item.title: 调查前 Glencore 员工的欺诈警察计划提出指控
item.description: 调查嘉能可公司（Glencore Plc）前雇员贿赂指控的英国检察官表示，他们计划提出期待已久的刑事指控。【原文：British prosecutors investigating former Glencore Plc employees over bribery allegations said they plan to bring long-awaited criminal charges.】

item.title: 物业困境让 PSP 损失数十亿美元，但股票收益挽救了业绩
item.description: 加拿大公共部门养老金投资委员会（Public Sector Pension Investment Board）今年的回报率达到 7.2%，部分原因是股票市场的牛市，但在房地产方面却出现了巨额亏损，因为它对办公楼的价值进行了减记。【原文：Canada’s Public Sector Pension Investment Board posted a 7.2% return for the year, partly due to the bull market in equities, but notched a big loss in real estate as it marked down the value of office buildings.】

item.title: 李嘉诚香港大厦租金自 2019 年以来下跌 33
item.description: 在十多年来最严重的商业地产市场不景气中，香港富豪们的摩天大楼租金损失高达三分之一。【原文：Hong Kong’s tycoons are seeing their skyscrapers lose rental values by as much as a third, amid the worst commercial property market slump in more than a decade.】

item.title: 遭受重创的乌克兰电力系统或将获得更多欧洲银行支持
item.description: 随着战时第三个冬季的来临，欧洲复兴开发银行正在研究加大支持力度，帮助乌克兰克服严重的电力短缺问题。【原文：The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development is studying increased support to help Ukraine overcome a critical shortage of electricity as a third winter in wartime approaches.】

item.title: 交易商消化勒庞保证，法国市场趋于稳定
item.description: 极右翼领导人玛丽娜-勒庞保证，如果她在本月晚些时候的全国大选中获胜，她将与埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统合作。【原文：French stocks clawed back some losses and bonds steadied as traders weighed assurances from far-right leader Marine Le Pen that she’d work with President Emmanuel Macron should she prevail in national elections later this month.】

item.title: Archegos 交易员的强硬证词让 Hwang 脸上的笑容荡然无存
item.description: 在审判的大部分时间里，Archegos Capital Management 创始人 Bill Hwang 看起来并不像一个可能面临数十年牢狱之灾的人。无论在法庭内外，人们经常看到 Hwang 脸上挂着平和的微笑。【原文：For most of his trial, Archegos Capital Management founder Bill Hwang hasn’t looked like a man potentially facing decades in prison. Both inside and outside the courtroom, Hwang is often seen with a placid smile on his face.】

item.title: 莱恩表示，欧洲央行看到市场重新定价，但不会出现混乱局面
item.description: 欧洲中央银行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，欧洲中央银行认为没有理由过度担忧法国近期的金融动荡。【原文：The European Central Bank sees no reason to be overly concerned about recent financial turbulence in France, according to Chief Economist Philip Lane.】

item.title: 德国储蓄银行回购股票计划被视为对债券持有人的不利因素
item.description: 北极证券（Arctic Securities）的分析师在给客户的一份说明中说，瑞典房东 SBB 用现金回购多达 5000 万股 D 类股票的计划对债券持有人来说是 "负面信用"，因为该公司的流动性状况将进一步削弱。【原文：Swedish landlord SBB’s plans to buy back as many as 50 million Class D shares with cash is “credit negative” for bondholders since the company’s liquidity position will weaken further, analysts at Arctic Securities said in a note to clients.】

item.title: 交易员评估勒庞的再次保证，法国债券走势暂缓
item.description: 极右翼领导人玛丽娜-勒庞保证，如果她在即将举行的全国大选中获胜，她将与埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统合作，这为法国政府债券赢得了一些喘息机会。【原文：French government bonds won some respite after assurances from far-right leader Marine Le Pen that she would co-operate with President Emmanuel Macron should she prevail in upcoming national elections.】
